name: Square Setter
description:
Hey people,
TaurusBytes here with our(my) first Game "Square Setter".

This is the full version for Android!

Also available on the Google Play Store.

Your goal is to conquer the map while you must not get hit from your enemy.

With each Level you accomplish, the enemy gets faster!

Small "Arcadey" - Game.

Be Sure to check the demo before you buy!

https://taurusbytes.itch.io/square-setter-demo

I hope you enjoy :)

Cheers 

Mario
